meanings.definition: A list of dishes available at a restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The menu at the diner had burgers and fries.
meanings.sent2: I always like to check the menu before ordering.
meanings.sent3: The menu seemed to be teasing me with its delicious descriptions.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was a menu of colorful outfits.
meanings.sent5: The menu was like a treasure map of culinary delights.

meanings.definition: A list of options or choices available for selection.
meanings.sent1: The menu of activities at the park included hiking and picnicking.
meanings.sent2: When shopping online, I prefer websites with a clear menu of categories.
meanings.sent3: The menu of movies to watch on a rainy day was overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a menu of conflicting thoughts and emotions.
meanings.sent5: The menu of vacation destinations was full of exciting possibilities.

meanings.definition: A list of commands or options displayed on a computer screen.
meanings.sent1: I clicked on the menu to save my document.
meanings.sent2: The menu on the software allowed me to customize my settings.
meanings.sent3: The menu on the screen felt like a secret code to unlock new features.
meanings.sent4: Her phone was a menu of apps waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The menu on the website made navigation easy and intuitive.
